entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 11:06 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers in the evening. Fog patches in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
